S02ekmuhr_u:5: ñ1.2 atha khalv āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisa[ttvo] mahāsattvo 'nekavidyādharakoṭīniyutaśatasaha[sreṇa] parivṛto yena bhagavāṃs tenopasamakrāmad
S02ekmuhr_u:6: ñ1.3 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā\var{#kṛtvā\lem \cod;
S02ekmuhr_u:8: ñ1.4 idaṃ mama bhagavann ekādaśamukhaṃ nāma hṛdayam ekādaśabhi [kalpako]ṭībhir bhāṣitam /
S02ekmuhr_u:10_0: cet tarhi \Dutt} bhāṣiṣyāmi sarva[sattvānā]m arthāya hitāya sukhāya sarvavyādhipraśa[ma]nāya{ḥ}
S02ekmuhr_u:12: t) samanupaśyāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyā<ḥ> prajāyā,
S02ekmuhr_u:13: yad anena hṛdayena rakṣe kṛte paritre parigra[he śā]ntisvastyayane daṇḍaparihare śastraparihare viṣadūṣaṇe\var{viṣa[dūṣa]ṇe \em \Hidas;
S02ekmuhr_u:14: viṣa[prahā]ṇe \em\Dutt} kṛte yaḥ kaś cid atikrame na praśame,
S02ekmuhr_u:16: sthāpya paurāṇāṃ karma vipacyat tad asya ca kalpayato 'bhiśraddadhataḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
S02ekmuhr_u:17: ñ1.8 sarvabuddhastutaḥ samanvāhṛto 'yaṃ hṛdaya<ṃ>. sarvatathāgatānumodito 'yaṃ hṛdayaṃ\var{hṛdayaṃ\lem \em; hṛdaye \cod}/
S02ekmuhr_u:18: ñ1.9 smarāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃ gaṅgānadībālukāsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ pareṇa śatapadmanayanacūḍā\var{#cūḍā#\lem \cod;
S02ekmuhr_u:25: saha pratilaṃbhe[na] daśasu dikṣu sarvatathāgatā<ḥ> sumukhībhūtā anutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilabdhāḥ /
S02ekmuhr_u:26: ñ1.11 evaṃ bahukaro 'yaṃ mā\ill*hṛdayaṃ tasmāt tarhi śrāddhena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā satkṛtyāyaṃ hṛdayaṃ sādhayitavya{ṇa}m /
S02ekmuhr_u:40: ñ1.20 [6] na viṣaṃ na garam na jvaraṃ na śastram kāye kramiṣyati /
S02ekmuhr_u:46: or a different counting is required
S02ekmuhr_u:51: ñ1.28 [4] itaś cutaḥ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāv upapatsyate
S02ekmuhr_u:52: smarāmy ahaṃ bhagavann it daśānāṃ gaṅgānadībāl[u]kāsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ tataḥ pareṇa paratareṇa mandāravagandho nāma tathāgato 'bhūt{a} /
S02ekmuhr_u:55: eṣa ca mayā hṛdayaṃ pravartitvā sarvabuddhānāṃ\var{sarvabuddhānāṃ\conj \Nagashima;
